name: Assstramori
description:
A cute visual novel based off of Asterion, an in progress GDA game

Learn about Tony and Tina, the two monsters haunting arcade and eventually date them.

Made in Ren'Py by GDA officers as an April Fools 2022 project

  • Nik Thomas, Parmpreet Gill, Stevie Rodriguez - Writing 
  • Annie Zhang, Tiana Chamsi - Character Art
  • Andrew Dunne - Background Art 
  • Joshua Augenstein - Programming 
  • Autumn Moulios - Music
